dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2817 IH: Protect Patient Access to Quality Health Professionals Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Harris introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to remove the non-discrimination requirements relating to health care providers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect Patient Access to Quality Health Professionals Act of 2013.

section.header: Removing non-discrimination requirements relating to health care providers
section.text: Section 2706 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300ggâ€“5) is amended by striking Non-discrimination in health care and all that follows through The provisions of section 1558 and inserting the following:
